mechanics.trigger: Take the Attack action on your turn
mechanics.condition: Character's class level is 5th or higher AND Character's class level is less than 11th
mechanics.outcome: You can make two weapon attacks instead of one

mechanics.trigger: Take the Attack action on your turn
mechanics.condition: Character's class level is 11th or higher AND Character's class level is less than 20th
mechanics.outcome: You can make three weapon attacks instead of one

mechanics.trigger: Take the Attack action on your turn
mechanics.condition: Character's class level is 20th or higher
mechanics.outcome: You can make four weapon attacks instead of one

description_text: Beginning at 5th level, you can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn. The number of attacks increases to three when you reach 11th level in this class and to four when you reach 20th level in this class.
